name: EUref vs petition
tagline: Map visualizing percentage of electorate that signed 2nd referendum petition
body:
### Data visualization by Jade Dickinson [@_jadedickinson](http://www.twitter.com/_jadedickinson).
Data from http://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215 , constituency data from wikipedia, constituency polygons from https://github.com/hubgit/boundary-line-constituencies-simplified
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
